fields.name: Javis Scenics Autumn Mix Lichen
fields.description: 30g (approx.) bag of Javis Scenics Autumn Mix Lichen, containing a variety of Autumnal colours, supplied by Javis Manufacturing. Made for model railways primarily, Javis Scenics supplies are equally suitable for wargaming terrain or dioramas to add realism and quality to your tabletop and bring your scenes to life. Useful for tree foliage, hedgerows or undergrowth, and any other plant life you might need for your figures and game boards! For best effects, you can combine this item with other Javis Scenics products to achieve fantastic results for your model bases, terrain and many other applications. As this is a natural product, it may be subject to various customs regulations that might prevent this product shipping abroad. Therefore, it is recommended that this product should be purchased by UK customers only.

fields.name: Javis Scenics No.1 Light Green Fine Turf Premier Range
fields.description: This pack contains 30g (approx.) of Light Green Fine Turf from Javis Scenics' Premier Range, supplied by Javis Manufacturing. Made for model railways primarily, Javis Scenics supplies are equally suitable for wargaming terrain or dioramas to add realism and quality to your tabletop and bring your scenes to life. Ideal for model bases and game boards alike, Javis Scenics' Premier Range boasts superior quality base material, high fade resistant, water stable and easily blended colour, allowing you to mix all types of Javis Scenics' scatter materials for best effects without having to worry about patches of colour standing out from one another - the colours naturally blend together to achieve a natural transition between shades for realistic results on your model bases, scenery or game boards!

fields.name: Warpaints - Matt Black
fields.description: With a high pigment concentration and smooth-flow formula, the Warpaints range from The Army Painter provide a concise range of acrylic paints which compliment their Colour Spray Primers perfectly. Supplied in 18ml Dropper Bottles, they provide easy application and even coverage - so, whether you play with large or small scale models, fighting upon ancient or futuristic battlegrounds, these high quality paints are ideal! This Matt Black paint is a perfect match to the Army Painter Black Spray Primer, and is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.description:

fields.name: Warpaints - Soft Tone Ink
fields.description:
Supplied in a handy 18ml Dropper Bottle, Army Painter Warpaints inks are a simple-to-use and effective method of adding shade and definition to your miniatures. Apply them with your paintbrush in the recessed areas of your model to give the impression of depth and shade, or add them to more detailed areas to give definition and a more pronounced appearance.
This Soft Tone Ink is best used over light coloured areas such as exposed flesh, and is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Strong Tone Ink
fields.description:
Supplied in a handy 18ml Dropper Bottle, Army Painter Warpaints inks are a simple-to-use and effective method of adding shade and definition to your miniatures. Apply them with your paintbrush in the recessed areas of your model to give the impression of depth and shade, or add them to more detailed areas to give definition and a more pronounced appearance.
This Strong Tone Ink is a versatile shade and can be used on armour, clothing, flesh, and many other surfaces. This ink is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Dark Tone Ink
fields.description:
Supplied in a handy 18ml Dropper Bottle, Army Painter Warpaints inks are a simple-to-use and effective method of adding shade and definition to your miniatures. Apply them with your paintbrush in the recessed areas of your model to give the impression of depth and shade, or add them to more detailed areas to give definition and a more pronounced appearance.
This Dark Tone Ink is best used over dark coloured paints, on areas such as hair, fur and armour. This ink is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Blue Tone Ink
fields.description:
The Quickshade Blue Tone Ink is loaded with heavy blue pigment in the popular Warpaints ink resin base. Use on top of white for an instant blue toned and shaded miniature or on top of blue colours for extra depth and shading. Try experimenting with Warpaints: Barbarian Flesh and Necrotic Flesh for that "cold from the grave" look - very striking! Shading and colour toning in one wash.
This ink is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Purple Tone Ink
fields.description:
The Quickshade Purple Tone Ink is loaded with deep Purple and heavier dark pigment in the popular Warpaints ink resin base. Use on top of white for an instant purple toned and shaded miniature or on top of purple, red or blue for extra depth and shading, or experiment with other colours such as Barbarian Flesh for unusual and interesting effects.
This ink is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Battlefield Essentials - Summer Undergrowth
fields.description: The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. The specialised Battlefields XP series is also available, and will add very realistic and cool effects to any base. If you want to make an army a cut above the rest, look no further! The Summer Undergrowth Essentials kit is supplied in a 150ml tub, providing material to add realistic bushes and undergrowth for great bases, and will add great diversity to larger bases for Warmachines, Chariots and monsters. The Summer Undergrowth is also perfect for use on scenery and gaming tables.

fields.name: White Colour Primer Spray
fields.description:
An ingenious combination of Primer and Colour Spray in one. The Colour Primers unique formula has been designed to be used on all metal, plastic and resin miniatures and leaves a perfect finish. The extra-fine pigment and special nozzle combination makes the Colour Primers easily cover the first time. The colours are matt, making your freshly sprayed miniatures or models ready for basecoat almost right away.
Save both time and money. No need for 2 different sprays - all you need is 1 Colour Primer for perfect results.
White-coloured Army-sized 400ml spray can, ideal as an undercoat or as a basecoat for any white or very light models.

fields.name: Black Colour Primer Spray
fields.description:

The extra-fine pigment and special nozzle combination makes the Colour Primers easily cover the first time. As the name suggests, the Chaotic Red is a must have for Chaos miniature collectors of any system or as a basecoat for futuristic warmachines or monsters. Army-sized 400ml spray can. Needs no undercoat - just spray onto your assembled model and you are ready to add details!

fields.name: Anti Shine Matt Varnish Spray
fields.description:
Designed as the perfect complement to The Army Painter Colour Primers and Warpaints, the Anti Shine Matt Varnish is an army-sized 400ml spray can that provides a strong protective layer and gives a truly matt finish to your models. This acrylic varnish is truly unique and has been tailored to remove the shine of any models being dipped with Quickshade or painted using conventional paints. Although really matt, the spray's original formula retains the metallic shine from metallic paints such as Plate Mail.
Always let any Quickshade dry for a minimum of 48 hours before using this varnish, and apply it in a thin coat. Never spray in humid conditions or cold weather. Test on a spare model first before spraying the whole army.

fields.name: AEGIS SUIT Satin Varnish
fields.description: The AEGIS SUIT Satin Varnish will protect any tabletop or roleplaying miniatures and  models from the wear and tear of the battlefield. Unlike the ANTI-SHINE Matt Varnish developed for Quickshade, the AEGIS SUIT will leave a slight satin finish on your models and is ultra protective on any acrylic surface. Protect the paint work you have painstakingly put onto your models by using this high quality satin varnish: the AEGIS SUIT will not let you or your models down. Developed specifically for The Army Painter's Warpaints acrylic range, the AEGIS SUIT Satin Varnish offers an alternative finish for those painters who want a slightly glossier shine for their models or the added protection that satin varnish offers over matt.

fields.name: Warpaints - Gorgon Hide
fields.description:
With a high pigment concentration and smooth-flow formula, the Warpaints range from The Army Painter provide a concise range of acrylic paints which compliment their Colour Spray Primers perfectly. Supplied in 18ml Dropper Bottles, they provide easy application and even coverage - so, whether you play with large or small scale models, fighting upon ancient or futuristic battlegrounds, these high quality paints are ideal!
 This paint is supplied in an 18ml Dropper bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Green Tone Ink
fields.description:
The Quickshade Green Tone Ink is loaded with heavy green pigment in the popular Warpaints ink resin base. Use on top of white for an instant green toned and shaded miniature or on top of green colours for extra depth and shading. Try experimenting with Warpaints: Barbarian Flesh and Necrotic Flesh for that "plague-ridden" look - very striking! Shading and colour toning in one wash.
This ink is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Warpaints - Brush-On Primer
fields.description:
Formulated from the same paint that makes up The Army Painter Colour Primers, this Brush-On Primer comes in an 18ml Dropper bottle and is ideal for applying whole undercoats with a brush in those situations where a spray undercoat isn't possible or practical.  Provides excellent coverage prior to the application of basecoats and highlights.
This Brush-on Primer is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Quickshade Strong Tone
fields.description:
250ml tin of Quickshade Strong Tone. Quickshade Strong Tone is the "default" shade for any modellers looking to follow The Army Painter method of dipping. Whether dipped or painted on with a brush, Quickshade Strong Tone looks extremely good on models which need a deep shading and the rich brown pigment has an almost evil feel to it. This Quickshade is the most popular of all the tones as it will add a fantastic shading effect to any army and give it a stunning overall look. If in doubt pick this tone!
The famous and ground-breaking Quickshade is a pigmented varnish which will shade your miniatures perfectly and still let the colours come through. Painting armies of miniatures to fantastic results has never been easier - especially if you combine this high quality product with the revolutionary Colour Primers. This product has been specifically designed and engineered to work with 10-28mm. miniatures and should not be confused with the many dodgy floor varnishes or shoe polishes... This product's sole purpose is for use with miniatures ONLY, and although it could possibly be used on a floor or a pair of shoes as well, we do not recommend it! The technique of dipping is not new. Shading your miniatures with a single dip is old, especially within the historical scene - but finally, a product which will shade your army perfectly and is fantastically easy to use.

fields.name: Quickshade Soft Tone
fields.description:
250ml tin of Quickshade Soft Tone. Quickshade Soft Tone is specially designed for lighter colours and looks extremely effective on whites, pinks or yellows as a consequence. Alternatively Soft Tone will give you an effective light shading effect, good for large surfaces and clean miniatures.
The famous and ground-breaking Quickshade is a pigmented varnish which will shade your miniatures perfectly and still let the colours come through. Painting armies of miniatures to fantastic results has never been easier - especially if you combine this high quality product with the revolutionary Colour Primers. This product has been specifically designed and engineered to work with 10-28mm. miniatures and should not be confused with the many dodgy floor varnishes or shoe polishes... This product's sole purpose is for use with miniatures ONLY, and although it could possibly be used on a floor or a pair of shoes as well, we do not recommend it! The technique of dipping is not new. Shading your miniatures with a single dip is old, especially within the historical scene - but finally, a product which will shade your army perfectly and is fantastically easy to use.

fields.name: Quickshade Dark Tone
fields.description:
250ml tin of Quickshade Dark Tone. Quickshade Dark Tone is the ultimate shading for metal colours as it uses black pigment instead of brown, creating a very fine black shading on your models. Dark Tone is also superb for models needing a sharp contrast such as tanks, robots, chaotic beings and knights. Great for shading your terrain projects too!
The famous and ground-breaking Quickshade is a pigmented varnish which will shade your miniatures perfectly and still let the colours come through. Painting armies of miniatures to fantastic results has never been easier - especially if you combine this high quality product with the revolutionary Colour Primers. This product has been specifically designed and engineered to work with 10-28mm. miniatures and should not be confused with the many dodgy floor varnishes or shoe polishes... This product's sole purpose is for use with miniatures ONLY, and although it could possibly be used on a floor or a pair of shoes as well, we do not recommend it! The technique of dipping is not new. Shading your miniatures with a single dip is old, especially within the historical scene - but finally, a product which will shade your army perfectly and is fantastically easy to use.

fields.name: Precise Detail Brush
fields.description:
This Precise Detail Brush will allow you to perform any precision paint job you want on your miniatures. It has a very sharp point, and is small and thin enough to get anywhere on a model.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. There are two series' of brushes from The Army Painter. The WARGAMER series (White) are special purpose brushes with sleek triangular handles for absolutely perfect grip. These brushes are top-end and each has the correct hair type for its purpose. All are handmade and manufactured in Europe. The HOBBY series (Red) brushes are made from the finest quality Toray synthetic hair and offer a great introduction to the painting hobby.

fields.name: Highlighting Brush
fields.description:
The Highlighting Brush is a great all round brush for making detailed highlights on your models. The brush has a sharp tip, making it useful for those hard-to-get areas of a miniature.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. There are two series' of brushes from The Army Painter. The WARGAMER series (White) are special purpose brushes with sleek triangular handles for absolutely perfect grip. These brushes are top-end and each has the correct hair type for its purpose. All are handmade and manufactured in Europe. The HOBBY series (Red) brushes are made from the finest quality Toray synthetic hair and offer a great introduction to the painting hobby.

fields.name: Basecoating Brush
fields.description:
The Basecoating Brush is the perfect brush for painting the bulk of infantry models. The brush end has the right thickness for holding paint without spilling it all at first stroke.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. There are two series' of brushes from The Army Painter. The WARGAMER series (White) are special purpose brushes with sleek triangular handles for absolutely perfect grip. These brushes are top-end and each has the correct hair type for its purpose. All are handmade and manufactured in Europe. The HOBBY series (Red) brushes are made from the finest quality Toray synthetic hair and offer a great introduction to the painting hobby.

fields.name: Insane Detail Brush
fields.description:
As the name suggests, the Insane Detail Brush is an extremely fine and small brush for the ultra small highlights, facial tattoos or just insane details like colouring the iris of an eye of a 28mm. miniature! Made from the purest Rothmarder sable hair, this is our most popular brush!
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. There are two series' of brushes from The Army Painter. The WARGAMER series (White) are special purpose brushes with sleek triangular handles for absolutely perfect grip. These brushes are top-end and each has the correct hair type for its purpose. All are handmade and manufactured in Europe. The HOBBY series (Red) brushes are made from the finest quality Toray synthetic hair and offer a great introduction to the painting hobby.

fields.name: Detail Brush
fields.description:
The Detail Brush is a superb sable brush that allows you to make very precise details on your models, be they weapon cartridges or very fine highlights on a face.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. fields.name: Character Brush
fields.description:
This Character Brush is ideal for painting single models like unit champions or Heroes as the tip is fine and sharp, which enables the user to apply basecoats and highlights with excellent precision.

fields.name: Regiment Brush
fields.description:
The Regiment Brush is perfect for quickly basecoating your models. The Rothmarder sable hairs on this brush and its considerable size makes the Regiment brush spectacular for speed painting big swathes of troops.

fields.name: Monster Brush
fields.description:
The Monster Brush is just the right size for any larger models such as Dragons, Trolls, Warmachines and Vehicles. This brush is made from the finest Toray synthetic due to the fact that a sable brush of this size could drown a miniature in paint  whereas the Toray releases the paint slower.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. fields.name: Small Drybrush
fields.description:
The Small Drybrush is a very popular brush. This spectacular drybrush has a 43 degree angle cut to make it no less than perfect for drybrushing small miniatures. The size of this brush is designed for drybrushing areas of a model, like chainmail or a weapon, and not necessarily the whole model at once.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. fields.name: Large Drybrush
fields.description:
The Large Drybrush is a speciality drybrush with a 43 degree angle cut on the hard tip, making it absolutely unique in design and superb for drybrushing - as you will not have to bend your wrist to hit the model 100% due to the expert cut. This brush is a must have for the serious painter!

fields.name: Vehicle Brush
fields.description:
The Vehicle brush has a flat stiff end, making it perfect for highlighting edges on tanks and drybrushing anything from scenery to most vehicles.

fields.name: The Psycho
fields.description:
The first of its kind made specifically for Wargaming, the Psycho is aptly named as it is indeed very small and ultra precise for that perfect lining or minuscule detail. Handmade from first-class Rothmarder sable and with the elegant and famous triangular handle, this brush is sure to become a hit with painters wanting nothing less than nano-precision.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. fields.name: Hobby Series: Drybrush
fields.description:
The bristles of this Hobby Series: Drybrush are flat topped and coarse, perfect for the drybrushing technique. The brush comes with a round handle, allowing for a flexible grip.

fields.name: Hobby Series Super Detail Brush
fields.description:
The Hobby Series Super Detail Brush is a super fine hobby brush for the smallest of paint jobs, like dotting the eyes or painting fine lines. The Super Detail brush comes with the characteristic red handle as do all our Hobby Brushes.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. fields.name: Masterclass Brush
fields.description:
This Masterclass Brush is as good as they come. The absolute finest Kolinsky Sable hair is used to make this handmade brush into a work of art. A needle-like point ensures maximum accuracy and the black triangular handle gives 100% control. Size 2/0.
The Army Painter is proud to present its top quality & complete brush range. Evolutionary in its design and with the right price, these brushes are arguably the best value brushes in the industry. There are two series' of brushes from The Army Painter. The WARGAMER series (White) are special purpose brushes with sleek triangular handles for absolutely perfect grip. The HOBBY series (Red) brushes are made from the finest quality Toray synthetic hair and offer a great introduction to the painting hobby.

fields.name: Javis Scenics 10mm Winter Static Grass
fields.description: This pack contains 30g (approx.) of 10mm Winter Static Grass, perfect for representing the longer wild grass of rural pastures and fields in the depths of winter, supplied by Javis Manufacturing. Made for model railways primarily, Javis Scenics supplies are equally suitable for wargaming terrain or dioramas to add realism and quality to your tabletop and bring your scenes to life. Ideal for model bases and game boards alike, static grass is perfect for adding a more realistic look and high level of detail to make your miniatures standout! For best effects, you can combine this item with other Javis Scenics products to achieve fantastic results for your model bases, terrain and many other applications.

fields.name: Battlefields XP - Miniature Razor Wire
fields.description:
The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. The specialised Battlefields XP series is also available, and will add very realistic and cool effects to any base. If you want to make an army a cut above the rest, look no further!
Make your model bases or gaming table stand out and give them a more authentic look with this awesome Miniature Razor Wire from Army Painter. In this blister pack you will get a staggering three metres of very realistic razor wire, also known as barbed wire. Perfect for the battlefields of WWII or the futurist post-apocalyptic wasteland. Great with 15mm to 28mm scale miniatures.
This blister contains 3 metres of miniature razor wire.

fields.name: Revell Mini Contacta Professional
fields.description: Revell Mini Contacta Professional polystyrene cement glue is perfect for pin-point accurate bonding of plastic models. The extra-fine hollow needle allows for micro-fine gluing of tiny details and clear part edges.  This mini bottle contains approximately 12.5g of polystyrene cement adhesive.

fields.name: Milliput Standard Yellow Grey
fields.description:
Milliput Standard Yellow Grey is the general purpose grade - it has been used for many years for the toughest tasks. Some typical applications include modelmaking, jewellery making and sculpting.
Milliput is a two-part, cold setting, non shrinking epoxy putty sold in cartons containing 113.4g, with one 56.7g stick of each part. We produce five grades of Milliput: Standard (Yellow/Grey), Terracotta, Silver Grey, Black and Superfine White. Milliput can be used for repairs on many types of materials including metals, plastics, masonry, wood, glass and ceramics and can be used in places where welding is impractical.

fields.name: Milliput Superfine White
fields.description:
Milliput Superfine White is the finest grade Milliput and is specially formulated for the restoration of porcelain and ceramics, or where a fine finish is desired. Milliput also allows for missing parts to be reconstituted.
Milliput is a two-part, cold setting, non shrinking epoxy putty sold in cartons containing 113.4g, with one 56.7g stick of each part. We produce five grades of Milliput: Standard (Yellow/Grey), Terracotta, Silver Grey, Black and Superfine White. Milliput can be used for repairs on many types of materials including metals, plastics, masonry, wood, glass and ceramics and can be used in places where welding is impractical.

fields.name: Milliput Terracotta
fields.description:
Milliput Terracotta is terracotta coloured standard Milliput. Milliput is a versatile manipulative two part epoxy putty which when mixed together sets rock hard. When first mixed, the putty is pliable and easily shaped. By wetting the Milliput with a finely woven moist cloth a very smooth finish can be easily obtained.
Milliput is a two-part, cold setting, non shrinking epoxy putty sold in cartons containing 113.4g, with one 56.7g stick of each part. We produce five grades of Milliput: Standard (Yellow/Grey), Terracotta, Silver Grey, Black and Superfine White. Milliput can be used for repairs on many types of materials including metals, plastics, masonry, wood, glass and ceramics and can be used in places where welding is impractical.

fields.name: Warpaints - Alien Purple
fields.description:
With a high pigment concentration and smooth-flow formula, the Warpaints range from The Army Painter provide a concise range of acrylic paints which compliment their Colour Spray Primers perfectly. Supplied in 18ml Dropper Bottles, they provide easy application and even coverage - so, whether you play with large or small scale models, fighting upon ancient or futuristic battlegrounds, these high quality paints are ideal!
This Alien Purple paint is a perfect match to the Army Painter Alien Purple Spray Primer, and is supplied in an 18ml Dropper Bottle.

fields.name: Battlefields XP - Meadow Flowers
fields.description:
The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. The specialised Battlefields XP series is also available, and will add very realistic and cool effects to any base. If you want to make an army a cut above the rest, look no further!
Make your model bases or gaming table stand out and give them a more authentic look with these fantastic Meadow Flowers Tufts from The Army Painter. Perfect for beautiful fields of meadow flowers that grow across the landscape. Great with 15mm to 28mm scale miniatures.
This blisters contains 77 Meadow Flowers Tufts. These vary in size and include 30 x small, 35 x medium and 12 large.

fields.name: Battlefields XP - Lowland Shrubs
fields.description:
The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. Make your model bases or gaming table stand out and give them a more authentic look with this awesome Lowland Shrub Tuft set from Army Painter. This tuft mimics bushes and wilderness shrubs - perfect for adding a different look to your bases.. Great with 15mm to 28mm scale miniatures.
This blister contains 77 Lowland Shrub Grass Tufts. These vary in size and include 30 x small, 35 x medium and 12 large.

fields.name: The Army Painter Plastic Glue
fields.description:
The Army Painter Plastic Glue is the perfect glue for assembling the massed plastic legions of every modeller! This bottle of polystyrene cement 'welds' plastic parts together to create an incredibly strong bond, with precision application possible thanks to the integral nozzle on the bottle.
Use in well-ventilated areas. Use in small amounts directly from the bottle.

fields.name: The Army Painter Super Glue
fields.description: The Army Painter Super Glue is the perfect glue for assembling metal and resin models and parts, where Plastic Glue just won't do the job. With the same precision nozzle as The Army Painter Plastic Glue, you can apply tiny drops exactly where you need them. This Super Glue is extreme value for money and the quality and thickness of the glue makes it the natural choice for any wargamer.

fields.name: The Army Painter Battlefields Basing Glue
fields.description:
The Army Painter Battlefields Basing Glue is used to glue sand and scatter to bases. It is water based and non-toxic. An ideal adhesive to accompany your basing materials, Army Painter Battlefields Basing Glue dries clear and works perfectly with The Army Painter range of Tufts, Battlefield Basing, Flocks and Rocks. This Bottle is also fitted with a pointed nozzle, allowing precise application and minimising waste.
This Bottle contains 50ml of Army Painter PVA Glue.

fields.name: The Army Painter Magic Superglue Activator
fields.description:
The Army Painter Magic Superglue Activator is used with super glue and creates an instant airtight bubble around the glue, drying it in seconds. Very effective! Use only in well ventilated areas!
This Magic Superglue Activator comes in a 20ml glass bottle.

fields.name: Cutting Mat
fields.description: The Cutting Mat is used as a base for all modelling, assembly and conversion of wargames miniatures, and will protect your workstation/table from unnecessary damage. The Cutting Mat is self-healing and is a must for every wargamer and modeller. The Cutting Mat is supplied with cutting lines, enabling you to ensure measured precise cuts.

fields.name: Kneadatite Green Stuff
fields.description: The Original Kneadatite Green Stuff - used by all model makers to create all normal sized miniatures from scratch. Green Stuff is also fabulous for adding extra bits to your models, such as fur, chain mail, pouches etc. It is a two component product and turns green when mixed. Each pack consists of two 4" strips of both yellow and blue putty. Mix in equal amounts for best results.

fields.name: Miniature and Model Drill
fields.description: Also referred to as a Pin Vice, the Miniature and Model Drill is used for drilling holes in miniatures and especially for pinning larger metal parts together by drilling a hole in each part and then connecting it with a small piece of brass wire (or piece of paper clip) and Super glue. Use it to drill realistic looking bullet holes in vehicles and heavy armour. Drill out gun barrels large or small. With a rotating head for greater accuracy of drilling this handy set contains:1 Drill 5 different drill bits 2 reversible collets for stronger drill-gripping (the spare is in the body of the drill!)

fields.name: Precision Side Cutters
fields.description: The Metal Precision Side Cutters is for wargaming metal miniatures and larger bits of resin. Made from stainless steel and with safety grip handle, it is a lot more durable than the Plastic Side Cutter although less precise.

fields.name: Curved Files
fields.description: These specialised Curved Files are designed to go around bends and difficult angles where traditional files cannot. Stainless steel and a head in each end, all with different shapes, surfaces and angles giving you different options for each difficult task you could face when filing bits.

fields.name: Hobby Pliers
fields.description: Designed for use primarily with metal miniatures, these stainless steel Hobby Pliers come with soft, comfortable grip. The pliers are useful for holding onto small bits as they get filed or attached using superglue. The rifled grip of the pliers make them ideal for bending metal miniatures (like arm twists etc.). They are made in stainless steel.

fields.name: Hobby Saw
fields.description: The Wargaming Hobby Saw has been designed to make clean cuts in both resin, plastic and metal miniatures. The saw is mostly used for converting miniatures and for cutting through miniature parts too thick for the Side Cutters.

fields.name: Plastic Frame Cutter
fields.description: The Plastic Frame Cutters are sharp, thin and precise. With this specialised tool you can cut your models from the sprue with ease and precision. It is ideal for trimming and converting all plastic models and miniatures. Pair of side cutters supplied in blister pack. Plastic miniatures to cut not included.

fields.name: Hobby Sculpting Tools
fields.description: The original Hobby Sculpting Tools are used in conjunction with Green Stuff and offer the modeller a range of different heads with each their function. The Army Painter's Hobby Sculpting Tools set includes 3 different carvers all made in stainless steel.

fields.name: Spare Drills & Pins
fields.description: The Spare Drills & Pins are used with the Miniature & Model Hand Drill. This set contains five drills in five different sizes (1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.5 and 1.8) and no less than 8 pinning rods in 3 different sizes.

fields.name: Miniature and Model Files
fields.description: The original Miniature and Model Files set offers excellent value and quality for all modellers and wargamers. The three files are the most commonly used shapes and will help you clean and prepare your models for assembly as well as nicely removing mould lines. Works perfectly with both metal, resin and plastic miniatures.

fields.name: Precision Hobby Knife
fields.description: With a safe locking mechanism and a comfortable, soft grip the Precision Hobby Knife is as safe to use as a knife ever gets! Comes with 5 razor-sharp scalpel blades ideal for cutting in plastic or tiny metal bits, banners or the like.

fields.name: Project Paint Station
fields.description: The Army Painter Project Paint Station is the perfect tool for the immaculate hobbyist, that wants all his or her Warpaints within easy reach and well sorted for their painting project. The Project Paint Station holds 30 assorted Warpaints and 7 brushes, which is more than you need for any specific army painting project.

fields.name: Plastic Assembly Set
fields.description: As far as product value goes, the Plastic Starter Set sets is an absolute high-score. Contains a set of Precision Plastic Cutters with extra fine point for precision work, a Precision Hobby Knife for removing flash and cutting, plus a 20ml pot of The Army Painter's amazing model Plastic Glue. Everything you need to get you started on assembling those plastic regiments. Also included is a FREE tool guide.

fields.name: Metal Assembly Set
fields.description: The Metal Assembly Set is a fantastic way to get you started assembling metal miniatures. The set contains a sturdy cutter for removing flash and cut smaller bits of metal, a file for preparing the parts to be glued together and a pot of The Army Painter Super Glue is included the box.  A description of how to use the tools is on the back cover of the set and an Intro Tool Guide flyer is also included!

fields.name: Most Wanted Brush Set
fields.description: The Army Painter Most Wanted Brush Set gives you the most popular brushes in a pack of its own! These brushes are the best value Wargaming brushes in the industry and are used by both beginners and old veterans alike. Including the popular Insane Detail and Regiment brushes, plus the innovative 43 degree angled Small Drybrush

fields.name: Hobby Brush Starter Set
fields.description: The Hobby Brush Starter Set from The Army Painter contains the three different brush types you need to paint any regular miniatures and covers the three basic techniques: basecoating, detailing and drybrushing. Contains the Hobby Series Drybrush, Standard  and Small Detail brushes. As an added bonus the Detail and Standard brushes come with the fabulous triangular grip from the popular Wargamer range.

fields.name: Mega Brush Set
fields.description:
With the Mega Brush Set you get the very best Wargames Brushes available - fulfilling every aspect of painting!
In the set you get one of every brush from The Army Painter Brushes range!

fields.name: Warpaints Starter Set
fields.description: The Army Painter Warpaints Starter Set is the perfect Starter Paint set for any wargaming system. All the base colours you need for painting miniatures. In this set you will find 10 of the most needed colours - including one Quickshade Wash that makes your miniatures come to life with a natural shading. The set even provides you with a brush to get you started! This set includes:one bottle each of Matt Black, Matt White, Pure Red, Daemonic Yellow, Greenskin, Ultramarine Blue, Leather Brown, Barbarian Flesh, Plate Mail Metal, Strong Tone Wash, plus one Hobby Highlighting Brush and The Army Painter Painting Guide

fields.name: Quickshade Washes Set
fields.description: The Army Painter Quickshade Washes Set contains eleven Quickshade Washes. These Washes are probably the best in the hobby and will get you perfect shading every time plus the option of adding a colour tone to your miniatures. All Quickshade Washes (Bottles) are a 100% colour match to the corresponding Quickshade Varnish (Pots). Contains: 11x 18ml Warpaints Quickshade Washes - Strong Tone, Dark Tone, Soft Tone, Flesh Wash, Light Tone, Mid Brown, Green Tone, Military Shade, Purple Tone, Blue Tone, Red Tone

fields.name: Vallejo Model Color - White #1
fields.description:
One 17ml bottle of Vallejo Model Color - White #1. The Model Color range contains 223 colours and an extensive assortment of mediums and varnishes, designed especially for miniature and model painting. The colours have been chosen with the help and advice of the best model painters from many countries. The Model Color range has been formulated with permanent pigments for fine arts; all colours are completely lightfast and opaque, (with the exception of the fluorescent and transparent colours, which are semi-opaque). A few metallic pigments (in an alcohol base) are included in the range, since these give a harder brilliance than the water based metallics.
The consistency of the Model Color range allows for an extremely smooth and uniform coverage, with no trace of brushstrokes. Professional model painters always work with a wet brush and dilute the paint with water or Matt Medium, applying many thin layers to achieve depth and shadows. Colours may also be diluted with other Mediums  for glazes and layered applications.
Model Color paints are presented in plastic bottles of 17ml with an eyedropper device which keeps paint from drying and prevents spills. 8 Metallic colours (in alcohol base) are presented in childproof bottles of 35 ml.

fields.description:

The Model Color range has been formulated with permanent pigments for fine arts; all colours are completely lightfast and opaque, (with the exception of the fluorescent and transparent colours, which are semi-opaque). A few metallic pigments (in an alcohol base) are included in the range, since these give a harder brilliance than the water based metallics.
The consistency of the Model Color range allows for an extremely smooth and uniform coverage, with no trace of brushstrokes. Professional model painters always work with a wet brush and dilute the paint with water or Matt Medium, applying many thin layers to achieve depth and shadows. Colours may also be diluted with other Mediums  for glazes and layered applications.
Model Color paints are presented in plastic bottles of 17ml with an eyedropper device which keeps paint from drying and prevents spills. 8 Metallic colours (in alcohol base) are presented in childproof bottles of 35 ml.

The Model Color range has been formulated with permanent pigments for fine arts; all colours are completely lightfast and opaque, (with the exception of the fluorescent and transparent colours, which are semi-opaque). A few metallic pigments (in an alcohol base) are included in the range, since these give a harder brilliance than the water based metallics.
The consistency of the Model Color range allows for an extremely smooth and uniform coverage, with no trace of brushstrokes. Professional model painters always work with a wet brush and dilute the paint with water or Matt Medium, applying many thin layers to achieve depth and shadows. Colours may also be diluted with other Mediums  for glazes and layered applications.
Model Color paints are presented in plastic bottles of 17ml with an eyedropper device which keeps paint from drying and prevents spills. 8 Metallic colours (in alcohol base) are presented in childproof bottles of 35 ml.

The colours have been chosen with the help and advice of the best model painters from many countries. The Model Color range has been formulated with permanent pigments for fine arts; all colours are completely lightfast and opaque, (with the exception of the fluorescent and transparent colours, which are semi-opaque). A few metallic pigments (in an alcohol base) are included in the range, since these give a harder brilliance than the water based metallics.
The consistency of the Model Color range allows for an extremely smooth and uniform coverage, with no trace of brushstrokes. Professional model painters always work with a wet brush and dilute the paint with water or Matt Medium, applying many thin layers to achieve depth and shadows. Colours may also be diluted with other Mediums  for glazes and layered applications.
Model Color paints are presented in plastic bottles of 17ml with an eyedropper device which keeps paint from drying and prevents spills. 8 Metallic colours (in alcohol base) are presented in childproof bottles of 35 ml.

fields.name: Transparent Water
fields.description:
Transparent Water is a high density, completely transparent gel, perfect for the reproduction of moving shallow water on textured ground, and especially for white water, cascades, ice effects and glaciers. Can be tinted with Model Air or Game Colour paints. Dries to a transparent and glossy finish in about 24 hours, depending on the thickness of the application. Applied to a non-porous surface, it can be peeled away when dry, and cut to the desired effect.
Supplied in a 200ml pot
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS PRODUCT CANNOT BE SENT VIA AIRMAIL AND MUST BE SENT VIA COURIER WITHIN THE UK

fields.name: Mediterranean Blue
fields.description:
Mediterranean Blue is a dense blue gel, of a colour similar to the Mediterranean Sea. Due to the translucent nature of the product, it is recommended to apply it on a base painted previously with a darker colour to enhance the effect of depth. The gel dries in approx. 24 hours, depending on the thickness of the application. The series of Water Textures has been formulated to reproduce the realistic effects of water, from a white running mountain brook to the greenish, still surface of a stagnant pool, from a muddy puddle on a road to the profound depth of the ocean.
Supplied in a 200ml pot
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS PRODUCT CANNOT BE SENT VIA AIRMAIL AND MUST BE SENT VIA COURIER WITHIN THE UK

fields.name: Vallejo Still Water
fields.description:
Vallejo Still Water is a glass clear liquid which levels itself, even on irregular surfaces, to reproduce the effect of transparent still water.  A high density, completely transparent gel, perfect for shallow water on textured ground, and especially for white water, cascades, ice effects and glaciers. Can be tinted with Model Air or Game Colour paints. Applied to a non-porous surface, it can be peeled away when dry, and cut to the desired effect. Apply in several fine layers of no more than 3 mm thickness to prevent cracks or bubbles in the drying process.
This pot contains 200ml of Vallejo Still Water
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS PRODUCT CANNOT BE SENT VIA AIRMAIL AND MUST BE SENT VIA COURIER WITHIN THE UK

fields.name: Rough White Pumice
fields.description:
Rough White Pumice is a heavy paste of resin, titanium white and natural pumice, with a rough white finish, for surface building and irregular terrain, reliefs and peaks. The placement of a model in a diorama or vignette gives it a reality, a background and a history, an added dimension and a reason for the humidity, the traces of mud, the dry sand of the desert or the dark earth of the wooded landscapes of central Europe. The range of Diorama Effects offers the modeller everything needed for the reproduction of  terrain, with effects of sandy and dusty roads, or of snow, mud and water, all of which add to the realism of the setting and relate the model to its environment.
Supplied in a 200ml pot
PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS PRODUCT CANNOT BE SENT VIA AIRMAIL AND MUST BE SENT VIA COURIER WITHIN THE UK

fields.name: Small Bluebell Patches
fields.description:
Serious-Play Scenics Small Bluebells Patches. Peel them off and stick them down to create your own bluebell woods. Perfect for using with smaller scale models, like N-gauge railway layouts or between 5-15mm wargaming. You could still definitely use these in larger scales, instead of looking like large wild patches of bluebells they would be smaller and could be used in gardens or as little patches of wild flowers.
48 patches per sheet

fields.name: Slate Cliffs Base Toppers
fields.description:
Slate Cliffs - Scenic Base Toppers, awesome bases, ready to go. Designed to fit perfectly on 25mm Round bases, the toppers are very slightly smaller so that they fit neatly. For best results undercoat your bases first using spray or brush then peel and stick down with PVA glue; you can also use a very light dusting of flock (or similar basing material) around the edges to give them a perfect finish.
10 Base Toppers per pack

fields.name: OO Scale Chickens
fields.description:
Our OO Scale chickens are perfect for farms and fields on your layout; each chicken has a slightly different pose and shape to add more realism.

All of our scale animals that are marketed as OO scale are true scale unlike most models which are actually HO scale. You can still use the animals in HO scale as well, as there is a little variety in size, they will still look great on an HO layout but we make them specifically for OO.

Each pack contains 10 unpainted chickens.

fields.name: Old Green Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Old Green Fine Leaf Foliage is a special kind of foliage perfect for giving a fantastic realistic effect to trees and bushes. It has a juicy vegetation look, can be used on trees or as undergrowth or curly kale! Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Blossom Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Blossom Fine Leaf Foliage is a mix of pink and white foliage to give a fantastic realistic effect to trees, flowers and bushes. Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Light Green Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Light Green Fine Leaf Foliage is a special kind of foliage perfect for giving a fantastic realistic effect to trees and bushes. It has a juicy vegetation look, can be used on trees or as undergrowth or curly kale! Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Forest Green Mixed Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Forest Green Mixed Fine Leaf Foliage is a green and light brown mix of fine leaf scatter foliage. Use on the ground or on bushes and trees. A special kind of foliage perfect for giving a fantastic realistic effect to trees and bushes. It has a juicy vegetation look, can be used on trees or as undergrowth or curly kale! Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Dark Green Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Dark Green Fine Leaf Foliage is a dark green leafy scatter that can be used to create a fantastic realistic effect on shrubs, flowers or bushes. Simple to use but very effective.  Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Paint Mixing Empty Bottles
fields.description: These 12ml Paint Mixing Empty Bottles are used to customize your paint by mixing different colours together. See-through labels let you see your new custom paint colour. You also get space on the label to make notes on what paint was mixed in. 6 x 12 ML BOTTLES WITH A CUT-OUT LABEL TO SEE YOUR COLOUR! CUSTOMISE YOUR LABEL TO KEEP TRACK OF YOUR COLOUR MIX. DROPPER BOTTLES ENSURE YOUR PAINT DOESN'T DRY OUT

fields.name: Tweezers Set
fields.description: Tweezers are a very useful tool for assembling miniatures and handling small components, especially for gluing, converting or handling decals. GLUE WITH PERFECT PRECISION AND CONTROL. 2 DIFFERENT TYPES FOR ANY TASK

fields.name: Mixing Balls
fields.description:
Mixing Balls

\nHeavy pigment, old paint or a combination thereof: the Mixing Balls will make your paints perfect again. The 5.5 mm stainless steel high-grade Mixing Balls will blend medium and pigment perfectly together, with a few shakes of your paint bottle. PERFECT FOR WARPAINTS BOTTLES! 5.5 MM DIAMETER STAINLESS STEEL. 100 MIXING BALLS!

fields.name: Drill Bits
fields.description:
This premium Drill Bits set gives you 10 drill bits and all the different drill bit sizes you could possibly want (8) to finish any task involving miniatures, drilling magnets in place or similar.
10 DRILLS: 2 x 0.7mm, 2 x 0.9mm, 1mm, 1.2mm, 1.5mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm

fields.name: Miniature & Model Magnets
fields.description: These supercharged rare-earth miniature & model magnets are very high grade & strength (N52), enabling you to do complex conversions or simply magnetise different weapons to your models. SUPER STRONG RARE-EARTH MAGNETS. PERFECT FOR CHANGING WEAPONS. MULTIPLE SIZES FOR ANY TASK. 80 x 3mm & 20 x 5mm

fields.name: Markerlight Laser Pointer
fields.description:
The Markerlight Laser Pointer will show you exactly what your models can see - no matter the terrain or battlefield. No more discussions on a gaming table - point and shoot with precision!
3 X BATTERIES INCLUDED!

fields.name: Targetlock Laser Line
fields.description:
No more “seeing around the corner” or avoiding difficult terrain - Targetlock Laser Line is a fantastic aid for all types of wargaming. Also used for various psychic powers and spell effects!
3 X BATTERIES INCLUDED!

fields.name: Rangefinder Tape Measure
fields.description: The Rangefinder Tape Measure is an invaluable tool for playing most wargames. At 3 metres long it will easily measure any range or normal size gaming table. Measures both in centimeters and inches!

fields.name: Size 12 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 12 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Size 10 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 10 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Size 8 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 8 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Size 6 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 6 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Size 4 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 4 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Size 2 Flat Brush
fields.description: The Size 2 Royal Flat Brush is an economy flat brush made from soft natural hair. It has a gold-coloured seamless aluminium ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle.

fields.name: Hobby Tool Kit
fields.description:
The Hobby Tool Kit is an amazing set that has been designed to give the wargamer a “one box fits all” tool kit. Includes all the basic tools you need to assemble any miniatures army. It also includes a free 5g Super Glue as well as a guide to tool safety and the Army Painter Technique Painting Guide. CONTAINS: HOBBY FILE, HOBBY KNIFE, GREEN STUFF (2 PIECES), HOBBY DRILL (3 DRILL
BITS), HOBBY SIDE CUTTER, SCULPTING TOOL

fields.name: Battlefields XP - Deadland Tufts
fields.description:
The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. The specialised Battlefields XP series is also available, and will add very realistic and cool effects to any base. If you want to make an army a cut above the rest, look no further!
Distant moons or undead kingdoms, the Deadland Tuft allows you recreate the chilling atmosphere of death. Great with 15mm to 28mm scale miniatures.
This blister contains 77 Deadland Tuft Grass Tufts. These vary in size and include 30 x small, 35 x medium and 12 large.

fields.name: Battlefields XP - Scorched Tufts
fields.description:
The Battlefields series has been made to give unlimited options to the wargamer, when they decide on what type of bases they want for their miniatures . All the materials are the best quality the market can offer.  The Essential series is the foundation of the base, with gravel, rocks, scatter and static grass. The specialised Battlefields XP series is also available, and will add very realistic and cool effects to any base. If you want to make an army a cut above the rest, look no further!
Razed by fire and war, the Scorched Tufts stand devoid of life on the battlefield. Great with 15mm to 28mm scale miniatures.
This blister contains 77 Scorched Tuft Grass Tufts. These vary in size and include 30 x small, 35 x medium and 12 large.

fields.name: Battlefields Basing Set
fields.description: This amazing set has been designed to give the wargamer a “one box fits all” for your miniature bases. Includes all the basic basing materials you need to make any base for your miniatures. It also includes a free 50ml Battlefields Basing Glue as well as the Army Painter Technique Painting Guide. Contains: Brown Battleground, Battlefield Rocks, Swamp Tuft (35 pieces), Summer Undergrowth, Battlefield Field Grass, Battlefield Snow, FREE 50ml Battlefields Basing Glue.

fields.name: Milliput Black
fields.description:
Black Milliput is the most recent addition to the Milliput range of products. Ideal if you want to match a black surface without painting it afterwards. Once cured the beauty of Milliput is that it can be drilled, filed and sanded while still retaining its adhesive properties and bonding strength.
Milliput is a two-part, cold setting, non shrinking epoxy putty sold in cartons containing 113.4g, with one 56.7g stick of each part. Millput produce five grades: Standard (Yellow/Grey), Terracotta, Silver Grey, Black and Superfine White. Milliput can be used for repairs on many types of materials including metals, plastics, masonry, wood, glass and ceramics and can be used in places where welding is impractical.

fields.name: Autumn Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Serious-Play 'Autumn Fine Leaf Foliage' is a blend of Orange and Yellow fine leaf scatter that is great to use spread across and in between scenery or on bases. Great to use for autumnal leaves or flowers. Simple to use but very effective.  Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Lavender Fine Leaf Foliage
fields.description:
Serious-Play Lavender 'Fine Leaf Foliage' Modelling Scatter. A special kind of foliage perfect for giving a fantastic realistic effect to trees and bushes. It has a juicy vegetation look, can be used on trees or as undergrowth or curly kale! Ideal for miniature basing, scenic dioramas and other hobby projects.
One 10g bag of fine leaf foliage. Image for illustrative purposes only - exact colour mix may vary.

fields.name: Javis Scenics Fine Spring Leaves
fields.description: Javis Scenics Fine Spring Leaves provide natural coloured material for trees, foliage and ground cover in a light spring green colour. Made for model railways primarily, Javis Scenics supplies are equally suitable for wargaming terrain or dioramas to add realism and quality to your tabletop and bring your scenes to life. Ideal for the typical grass and field battlegrounds of Western Europe during WW1 and WW2, but appropriate for all similar grassland theatres of war for your figures and game boards. For best effects, you can combine this item with other Javis Scenics products to achieve fantastic results for your model bases, terrain and many other applications.

fields.name: Javis Scenics Fine Summer Leaves
fields.description: Javis Scenics Fine Summer Leaves provide natural coloured material for trees, foliage and ground cover in a summer green colour. fields.description: Javis Scenics Fine Autumn Leaves provide natural coloured material for trees, foliage and ground cover in a golden autumnal colour. Ideal for the typical grass and field battlegrounds of Western Europe during WW1 and WW2, but appropriate for all similar grassland theatres of war for your figures and game boards. fields.name: Das Clay White 1kg
fields.description:
DAS Clay White 1kg will help you create a huge range of clay model designs easily – without the need for an oven or kiln.
An easy modelling material to work with, this clay moulds easily and dries to a firm and strong finish. There is no baking required; simply design your model and then allow for 24 hours per centimetre to dry. It is easy to smooth and will set strongly once air-dried, and then you can start decorating.
You can decorate with poster paints, acrylics and varnish to add bold colours and a professional finish to your projects. Whatever you're moulding the clay into, you'll be able to add the perfect finishing touches and finer details.

fields.description:

fields.name: Masterclass Drybrush Set
fields.description: The Masterclass Drybrush Set from The Army Painter gives you a set of specially designed drybrushes in three different sizes - 7mm, 12mm and 15mm. These spectacular and highly specialised drybrushes give ultra-realistic results and very smooth coverage - revealing every detail of your miniature with ease. The brushes are versatile and can be used for both large models, terrain, and vehicles as well as any normal-sized model. The results and effects you get with these Masterclass Drybrushes far surpass that of any normal drybrush. Perfectly shaped for any dry brushing task and stippling .Give ultra-realistic results - revealing every detail of your miniature with ease. Natural hair gives the Masterclass Drybrushes a superior finish over other Drybrushes.

fields.name: Warpaints Metallics Paint Set
fields.description: From terrifying guns to magic armour, jewellery to treasure chests - the Warpaints Metallics Paint Set has you covered! These 8 metallic Warpaints come in 18ml dropper bottles, perfect for administering the right amount of paint for your miniatures. The light, creamy viscosity of these acrylic metallic Warpaints is perfect for miniatures, large and small, and they mix perfectly with each other for any variation you might want. 8x 18ml metallic Warpaints. Heavy pigment - superior coverage!16 FREE Stainless Steel Mixing Balls

fields.name: Wet Palette Hydro Pack
fields.description: The perfect top-up pack for The Army Painter Wet Palette. This Hydro Pack contains 50 Hydro sheets & 2 pieces of air-tight Hydro foam.

fields.name: Warpaints Airbrush Medium
fields.description: The Army Painter has developed Warpaints Airbrush Medium to enable their superior quality Warpaints to be used with an airbrush. The Airbrush Medium is highly versatile, and any high-quality acrylic paint will benefit from it. A real quality of this product is that the Airbrush Medium not only works as a thinner for acrylic paints - but also as a flow improver! The Airbrush Medium comes in a 100ml dropper bottle

fields.name: Wet Palette
fields.description: A premium wet palette at an astonishing price point! The best wet palette there is - superior quality and custom-designed to keep your Warpaints preserved perfectly smooth and creamy! The Wet Palette comes with 2 sheets of hydro foam and 50 hydro sheets. Special inner layer design can hold up to 6 Wargamer brushes and 10 Hobby brushes from The Army Painter range. Perfect for acrylic paints! 2 pcs. of hydro foam. 50 pcs. of hydro sheets included. Hard plastic cover - safe transport. Protected with anti-mould agent. Easy to clean - easy to store!

fields.name: Vallejo Game Color Wash - Sepia
fields.description:
One 17ml bottle of Vallejo Game Color Wash - Sepia.
Acrylics colors in a matt and opaque, water-based formula, especially designed for brush-on use. Each color has been meticulously developed in collaboration with model-painters who specialize in fantasy figures and dioramas. The formulation of these colors has been developed signed taking into account that some of these figures are used in tabletop games, so that Game Color is manufactured with a revolutionary new resin which offers extraordinary resistance to the damage caused by frequent handling. It is recommended to apply Game Color on a previously primed surface. The colors dry rapidly and form a homogenous and self-leveling film while preserving even the smallest detail of a miniature. Game Color presents an extra ordinary adherence on all grounds, such as resin, plastic, steel and white metal.
Game Color paints are presented in plastic bottles of 17ml with an eyedropper device which keeps paint from drying and prevents spills.

fields.name: Vallejo Game Color Wash - Umber
fields.description:

fields.name: Vallejo Foam Effect
fields.description: Vallejo Foam Effect is a heavy, extra opaque white acrylic, which can be applied directly from the bottle, has been formulated for simulating raised crests on waves. The product can be sculpted with a palette knife or dry-brushed to form whirls & wakes on the surface of tinted Water gels. Dries quickly to a hard, white surface.

fields.name: Warpaints Metallic Colours Paint Set
fields.description:
Want to paint magical armour, alien weaponry, or tainted treasure? Or perhaps the glistening, draconic hide of fantastic beasts? The Warpaints Metallic Colours Paint Set has you covered!
Along with a wide array of metallic colours, we have also included our brand new Metallic Effects paint - Fairy Dust. With this new paint, you can turn any of our Warpaints into a vibrantly shimmering metallic with a single coat.
Our paint comes in spill-proof 18 ml./ 0.6 fl. oz. dropper bottles - perfect for both wet palettes and airbrushing. Our non-toxic, water-based paints have a creamy viscosity making it ideal for miniature painting, and they mix smoothly with each other to create any combination of colors that you dream up! 9 x 18ml Metallic Colour Warpaints, 1 x 18ml 'Fairy Dust' Effects Warpaint. Heavy pigment - superior coverage! 16 FREE Stainless Steel Mixing Balls

fields.name: Vallejo Game Color Wash - Pale Grey
fields.description:

fields.name: D&D Nolzur's Marvelous Brush Set
fields.description:
Even with Nolzur's Marvelous Pigments, applying any type of paint is often done best with a brush. The Dungeons & Dragons brush set contains 3 fantastic brushes - each selected for a special purpose and combined they make a perfect starter selection for any painter.
Contains: 1x Drybrush, 1x Detail Brush, 1x Basecoat Brush
